titleStmt.title: Receipt for Tax Payments in Kind
titleStmt.author: Unknown tax-collector

msContents.summary: Receipt of grain for land tax

msItem.note: Receipt canceled with double lines running diagonally across the writing surface, probably after having been used to compile a summary of the payments of the year.;For the date of the archive of Ptollas's sons, see PMich VI, p. 101 and 108 (First half of IVth cent. AD, mainly for proposographical reasons); P.J. Sijpesteijn, ZPE 64 (1986) p. 118 (Beginning of Vth cent. AD, for palaeographical reasons - BL VIII, 213); P.Sorb. II, p. 46 (also favoring a date in the Vth cent. A.D., for typological and palaeographical reasons).
Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
see electronic version of PMich VI, 403

p.note: badly damaged; a section of the papyrus has broken off along the bottom fold and has been lost

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

div.ab: Mesore 28, of grain of the sixth indiction, for Karanis, Nilammon(?) son of Toullas, including the twentieth . . . artabai . . ., [. . . artabai . . .], exclusive of the shipping charge. The 30th, the same, again, 30(?) artabai [- - -]

listBibl.bibl: Pearl OM-Youtie HC, PMich VI, 403, 1944 -- BL VIII, 213 (date; l. 6)
